name: Deer Hunter
synopsis: The deep outdoor hunting series makes its console debut on the PlayStation 2.  Deer Hunter delivers an addictive hunting experience, featuring over 15 in-game animals and an online Tournament Mode for intense competition with up to eight players.  Explore a variety of hunting areas, drive off-road vehicles, and hunt with a wide assortment of realistic weapons.  Deer Hunter also offers added thrills and adventure with two-player split-screen mode for cooperative or competitive play.  Test your skills and strategy in the ultimate hunt.
